features: FIGHTS BAD BREATH: TheraBreath Fresh Breath Mouthwash fights bad breath for 24 hours when used every 12 hours after brushing and flossing
DENTIST FORMULATED: Dr. Katz created the TheraBreath formulas in 1993 to help his own daughter with her bad breath
ADA ACCEPTED: Our alcohol-free, non-burning formula is powered by oxygen, and is ADA accepted to help reduce bad breath
RESTORE CONFIDENCE: TheraBreath believes you should define success any way you please. We exist to motivate you to go get it!
IT'S A BETTER MOUTHWASH: Try the #1 fastest growing mouthwash brand in the USA (data on file)
body.description: Bad breath is nothing to be ashamed of...everyone gets it! ADA accepted TheraBreath Fresh Breath Mouthwash has been fighting bad breath for over 25 years. When used as directed, it's clinically shown to fight bad breath for 24 hours when used every 12 hours after brushing and flossing. This alcohol-free mouthwash doesn't burn or irritate, and the oxygenating compound that fights bad breath starts working instantly. TheraBreath Fresh Breath Mouthwash has no artificial dyes and is certified kosher, vegan, and gluten-free. We’re so confident in the effectiveness of TheraBreath Oral Rinses that we back them up with our 100% guarantee. If you haven’t seen improvement in your breath, contact us within 30 days of purchase for a full refund. TheraBreath: It's a better mouthwash, satisfaction 100% guaranteed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The ONLY mouthwash that keeps my mouth moisturized ALL DAY!!
reviews.reviewText: For whatever reason (possibly due to medications i take), i am left with a constant dry mouth, and if you are someone who has ever experienced this, it is TORTURE, especially at night. this mouth wash 1x in the am and 1xx at night leaves my mouth hydrated 100% to the point where i am no longer needing to drink tons of water a day and night (which is sooooo nice since needing to get up in the middle of the night to drink or use the bathroom is SO ANNOYING!).this mouthwash is pretty pricey, but to me it's absolutely worth it because it actually has changed the quality of my life. i know that's a big claim to make about a MOUTH WASH, but when you've experienced severe, long-term dry mouth and then finally find relief, it literally feels like a miracle!the only heads up i will give you is that do NOT NOT NOT NOT NOT use COLD water to rinse your mouth with this as the "icy flavor" of the mouthwash will make your mouth feel like it's -100 degrees. just use luke warm/cool water and you will be fine.i cannot recommend this brand enough. i can see why it's a best seller. thank you to this brand for helping me with my dry mouth!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Longer lasting freshness and pleasant taste
reviews.reviewText: I was actually looking for smart mouth mouth wash but this kept coming up in my search results. After reading the reviews and seeing such a high rating I tried it. I got the icy mint and I am a big fan! It is tingly but not burning. The after taste is pleasant and I wake up with a normal tasting mouth, not morning breath. If I rinse after a meal it takes away food odors and is mild enough in taste I'm not worried about an orange juice and Toothpaste kind of bad flavor. I don't have to rinse my mouth after using to get rid of the burn and it doesn't hurt/burn my cheeks or gums. I prefer this over any I've tried because it leaves my mouth feeling clean but not overpowering with strong flavor or discomfort of any kind. I appreciate that the liquid is clear as well so If you spill a drop or two there's not an ugly blue stain on the sink or counter. Will recommend and repurchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I can’t live with out this
reviews.reviewText: TheraBreath Icy Mint Mouthwash has been a game-changer for me in the battle against bad breath! I can't express enough how effective and refreshing this product is.Firstly, the icy mint flavor is fantastic—refreshing without being overpowering. Using this mouthwash leaves my mouth feeling incredibly clean and minty fresh for hours on end. It's a relief to have found a mouthwash that not only masks bad breath but actually targets its root cause.The oxygen-based formula is a game-changer. I've noticed a significant improvement in my breath's freshness since I started using TheraBreath. The way it combats bad breath is truly remarkable, providing a long-lasting clean feeling that lasts throughout the day.What's more, I appreciate the absence of alcohol and artificial additives. This mouthwash is gentle on my mouth and doesn't cause any irritation or discomfort, which was a concern with other products I've used in the past.The convenience factor is also worth mentioning. It's easy to use and integrates seamlessly into my daily oral hygiene routine. Plus, the bottle design makes it easy to dispense the perfect amount without any mess.For anyone seeking a reliable solution to combat bad breath, TheraBreath Icy Mint Mouthwash is an absolute must-try. It's become a staple in my oral care routine, and I can confidently say it's one of the best mouthwashes I've ever used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So this review is gonna get a bit personal. I brush my teeth and do all the things I am supposed to but still had bad breath. I didn’t understand what it was and was even at times to the point I felt so self conscious when needing to speak to people especially if up close. I decided I really had to do something one day when I got in the car and my wife actually asked me did I remember to brush my teeth. I got mad at her and realized quickly after I was only angry because I felt bad about me. I had previously seen therabreath but figured it was like every other mouth wash that promises results. I decided to try it and it is only one week in but on day one (I tried it as soon as it arrived) I went and blew in my wife face and she said it smelt good I can’t recall the last time I felt confident with my breath. Better yet after doing it before bed I woke up and there was no morning breath. My breath actually smelt better than my wife’s. I actually a, confident now at random times of the day going and asking my wife how my breath smells. I feel confident at work and since starting I have been using as instructed and have had no signs of bad breath. I feel like I can live again because of this. My only concern is with doing two capfuls twice a day (as instructed) it seems I will go through one bottle a week and didn’t think I’d need to keep so many on hand. I haven’t found where they sell a large bottle just two bottles together. Would rather it come in a larger size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good stuff
reviews.reviewText: Just started using this yesterday. You can tell taste the difference. There is no alcohol so you don’t get that burning/spicy feeling. It does the job. The minty flavor is not too over powering. It’s very unique to say the least. I bought the two bottles package so I’m going to try this out and see how it goes.
The items were cheaper online and as described. Good buy!

This stuff works like it says. I have used many other brands but nothing comes close to it. It has a slight medicinal after taste but nothing strong. Fully recommend it. Try it and you will not regret it.
ちょっと辛い感じます、でもいい感じ、結構長い時間スーって感じ
Queda un aliento muy padre durante mucho tiempo

reviews.reviewTitle: I did face so much of mental trauma because of my bad breath. I tried every possible thing in my ...
reviews.reviewText: This is my very first Review of any product, I did face so much of mental trauma because of my bad breath. I tried every possible thing in my reach, the funny thing is I visited Otolaryngologist thinking it might solve this, I ended up spending 2000$ but in vain. I am not exaggerating but I became suicidal. I look Good, have quite good teeth, good smile but bad breath played a devil in my life. I did lose quite a lot, some places I was rejected, some places I rejected myself because I knew I would be rejected ultimately. While talking over phone to anyone I could play the master and win, but if I use to talk to anyone in person, Gosh you can guess "Bad Breath". If you are facing this then look no further it will do its work.
